thought: To craft a sticky piston, I need to craft a slime ball. A slime ball requires 9 slime blocks in the crafting grid. I have a slime block at slot 17, so I will move it to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 1 with quantity 1
